SELECT /* WBEAFutureCarContestListMapper.selectFutureCarContestList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'BSN11' )B INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst C on C.episd_seq = b.episd_seq WHERE C.episd_seq = a.episd_seq ) AS REG_CLI ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'BSN11' )B inner join cx_appctn_mst C on C.episd_seq = b.episd_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl D on D.appctn_seq = C.appctn_seq WHERE C.episd_seq = a.episd_seq AND D.rsume_ord = 3 and D.mng_stts_cd='WBKB_REG_LRT001' )WIN_CLI , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS PLACE_NM , (SELECT SUM(PRIZE_PMT) FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ) AS PRIZE_PMT ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC

SELECT /* WBKAFutureCarContestMapper.getFutureCarContestListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS PLACE_NM , (SELECT SUM(PRIZE_PMT) FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ) AS PRIZE_PMT ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A

SELECT /* WBKAFutureCarContestMapper.selectFutureCarContestDtl*/ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE ,PLACE_SEQ ,ADD_NTFY_CNTN ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID ,REG_IP ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'BNS11' )B INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst C on C.episd_seq = b.episd_seq WHERE C.episd_seq = a.episd_seq ) AS REG_CLI , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID ,MOD_IP , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getRoundDtl */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM ,EXPS_YN , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = 'BSN11' AND EXPS_YN = 'Y' ) A WHERE DATE_ORD = 1 ORDER BY ACCS_STRT_DTM, BSN_STRT_DTM ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* WBKAFutureCarContest.selectPrizeList*/ PRIZE_SEQ ,EPISD_SEQ ,WDCRM_CD ,PTCPT_TYPE ,PRIZE_PMT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = A.WDCRM_CD) AS WDCRM_NAME , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = A.PTCPT_TYPE) AS PTCPT_NAME FROM CX_EPISD_PRIZE_DTL A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY PRIZE_SEQ ASC

SELECT /* WBKAFutureCarContest.selectPlaceList */ (SELECT NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS NM , (SELECT CD_NM FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST B INNER JOIN CO_CODE_MST C ON B.RGNS_CD = C.CD WHERE B.PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS RGNS_NAME , (SELECT ZIPCODE FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS ZIPCODE , (SELECT BSC_ADDR FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS BSC_ADDR , (SELECT DTL_ADDR FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS DTL_ADDR , (SELECT RPRSNT_TEL_NO FROM ED_EDCTN_PLACE_MST WHERE PLACE_SEQ = A.PLACE_SEQ) AS RPRSNT_TEL_NO FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBKAFutureCarContestMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST
